author: davidlt
body:
TString support conversions to const char * and std::string_view in
C++17, but both are supported in std::string constructor and operators
thus causing ambiguity for the compiler.

Signed-off-by: David Abdurachmanov <David.Abdurachmanov@cern.ch>
title: Fix C++17 issues in HLTrigger/HLTanalyzers
